channel.title: BIOS2 Education resources
channel.description: Educational materials, incluing links to pdfs, videos, and code to reproduce all of our trainings.

item.title: Point-count Data Analysis
item.dc:creator: Peter Solymos
item.description: Analysis of point-count data in the presence of variable survey methodologies and detection error offered by Peter Solymos to BIOS2 Fellows in March 2021.

item.title: Science Communication
item.dc:creator: Gracielle Higino
Katherine HÃ©bert
item.description: Recordings, content and handouts from a 6-hour Science Communication workshop held over two days on 15 and 16 June 2020.

item.title: Mathematical Modeling in Ecology and Evolution
item.dc:creator: Dr Sarah P. Otto
item.description: This workshop will introduce participants to the logic behind modeling in biology, focusing on developing equations, finding equilibria, analyzing stability, and running simulations.Techniques will be illustrated with the software tools, Mathematica and Maxima. This workshop was held in two parts: January 14 and January 16, 2020.
